api_list.name: Cow
api_list.description: Learning Ruby on Rails creating REST API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rails-cowsay-api.p.rapidapi.com/say"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rails-cowsay-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rails-cowsay-api.p.rapidapi.com/say"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rails-cowsay-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
